extendedInfo.description: Planetary Wars is a fast-paced real time strategy game. Conquer enemy planets with your fleets of ships to eradicate the whole galaxy. The basics are easy to learn but for real success it needs a good strategy.Featuring:- infinite number of unique levels- adaptive AI- online highscore

reviews.title: Computer is too good
reviews.comment: You made the computer too hard in the latest update...now they\'re ridiculously good.  This game is..was perfect for meaningless fun while on the john. Now the comp is way better than me...I don\'t like it.
reviews.author: David Andre

reviews.title: Gets too hard too quickly
reviews.comment: I can\'t change the name of the player and after level six or seven, you haven\'t got a chance. Looks and feels nice otherwise.
reviews.author: Chris Maris

reviews.title: Superb
reviews.comment: This is a sublime strategy game that is fascinatingly simple but remarkably addictive. The AI is tough though. You have been warned!
reviews.author: Sam Aitcheson

reviews.title: GREAT!
reviews.comment: Loved the game, simple, easy and fun! One of the best your going to find, worth the little space on your phone. And the A.I isn\'t really all that hard. You just gotta be fast.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Fast-pace, great AI, challenging. At higher levels,  you blink,  you lose ;-) Very light on device resources,  didn\'t crash even once.  Good  job!
reviews.author: Paulo Sim\303\265es

reviews.title: Good game play, unbeatable AI
reviews.comment: I am a huge fan of this style game play. But it\'s no fun to play when the AI is so powerfully unbeatable. Is your coding scaling the AI based on available processing power? (ie is it four times faster than me due to quad core CPU?)  Please fix as it is simply unplayable.
reviews.author: Jake Hegnauer

reviews.title: Great until the last update
reviews.comment: I really enjoyed playing this game but now the ai is too difficult to beat once you have played a few games. Dev\'s please fix this!
reviews.author: Sam Warren

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: This is the without doubt the game I have obsessed over most since chess and civilization.  I got so good at this iI used to try to win in under 18 seconds. The latest AI update has really spoiled the party. I now struggle to win whereas before I could often win in 10 seconds. It\'s a shame I can\'t play the new one as a different game because I feel I have lost the old game I fell in love with. I am not certain but feel like AI is cheating now. Would be 5 if I had option to toggle between old school and new versions.
reviews.author: John Moore

reviews.title: Pretty disappointed
reviews.comment: Since the change, pretty much a lose every match game.  Looking forward to the devs fix.
reviews.author: Kenneth McKnight

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: No annoying money traps, I don\'t mind paying for games, but I mind \"free\" games that more or less can\'t be played without paying. At first I thought this game was a bit too fast and hard after about 10 games. Now I am ranked #16 on the 300-500 ladder. It\'s just awesome. Challenging, but doable. I did not like the point system from the start, but now when I am (almost) mastering the game, I appreciate it. I love the balance between simplicity and challenge. There is only one game element, still, endless fun.
reviews.author: Magnus Mansson

reviews.title: Simple but hard n fun
reviews.comment: Simple but hard! Enemy not Stop attacking me but I\'m win. I\'m enjoy this apps. You wish is get 5 star right? You got it!
reviews.author: Salom Ngu

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Super tough computer until you get the hang of things. Still throws you a curve ball every once in a while. Overall great game.
reviews.author: James Lyday

reviews.title: Bad Update
reviews.comment: Latest update chanced the difficulty of the ai too much. The game is too calculating to the point of the player not meeting able to make more than a token push. Game was fun until then.
reviews.author: Adam Price

reviews.title: AI gets too good too fast
reviews.comment: i rocked the first 4 levels and suddenly i cant last a whole minute -.- me no likey... other than that i love this game.. would be so freaking awesome if this have a multiplayer option.. over bluetooth wifi doesn\'t matter just multiplayer :D
reviews.author: Basel Khirfan

reviews.title: Gets hard way to quickly
reviews.comment: The 5th level is really hard not like the level before. It\'s litteraly impossible for anyone to beat it
reviews.author: Dakota Mallette

reviews.title: Mostly okay
reviews.comment: AI has the ability to budget its ships, putting it on another playing field, which I find annoying. Other than that, love it
reviews.author: Jacob Hartmann

reviews.title: Great, but broken
reviews.comment: Great concept, but AI difficulty is horribly broken.
reviews.author: Bram Tops

reviews.title: Different rules
reviews.comment: The computer acts on different rules to the player? What\'s the point? There are much better games in this genre
reviews.author: Luke Coughlan

reviews.title: Addicting
reviews.comment: A great game and fun
reviews.author: roger hackett

reviews.title: Challenging, not impossible
reviews.comment: Not sure why everyone is complaining about the difficulty. You can\'t win in a long macro game, as the AI is very efficient, but you can exploit its moves to your advantage. It\'s hard, but that\'s what makes it fun.
reviews.author: Timothy Takehara
